metadata.Title: CVE-2022-35652 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: An open redirect issue was found in Moodle due to improper sanitization ofuser-supplied data in mobile auto-login feature. A remote attacker cancreate a link that leads to a trusted website, however, when clicked, itredirects the victims to arbitrary URL/domain. Successful exploitation ofthis vulnerability may allow a remote attacker to perform a phishing attackand steal potentially sensitive information.

criterions.comment: moodle: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
